src:
Mlajšega moškega našli podhlajenega
Člani njegove skupine so poskrbeli, da mu je bila nudena ustrezna zdravniška oskrba.
02 Nov 2019, 06:08 by A. L.
GORJE – V petek ob 23.09 so pri sestopu z Mrežc nad Pokljuko, občina Gorje, pogrešali pohodnika, ki se je ločil od skupine in je sam sestopil v dolino.Reševalci GRS Radovljica so v več skupinah in po različnih poteh odšli proti Mrežcam in mlajšega pohodnika, ki je na poti zašel, podhlajenega našli ob 1.30 pod Blejsko kočo pod planino Lipanco. Prepeljali so ga do lokacije, kjer je bila njegova skupina, člani pa so poskrbeli, da mu je bila nudena ustrezna zdravniška oskrba, poroča uprava za zaščito in reševanje.
text:
The younger man was found subdued
Members of his group made sure that he was provided with appropriate medical care.
02 Nov 2019, 06:08 by A.L.
GORJE - On Friday at 23.09, when descending from Mrežc above Pokljuka, the municipality of Gorje, they missed a hiker who separated from the group and descended into the valley alone. , who went on his way, found a chilled one at 1.30 under the Bled hut under the Lipanca Mountain. He was transported to the location where his group was, and members made sure he was provided with appropriate medical care, the Protection and Rescue Administration reported.
